title: The Quarry 60 Second Review #shorts

transcript_chunks.text: the quarry is a game for the makers of until dawn and it's great if you enjoy choose your own adventure horror where you play as a group of camp counselors trying to survive one terrifying night in the woods it's a definite must play like until dawn any character can live or die based on your decisions so make sure to choose every action wisely because these woods are even more dangerous and creepy than they look it's not the most scary game but if supernatural creatures lurking in the dark is something on your phobia list brace yourself the thing i love most about the game though are the characters the corey sports an all-star cast highlighted by brenda song justice smith and ted rainey but every single character has something fun that they bring to the table whether it's cheesy team romance creepy cop vibes or dumb jock attitude with the sweet side this might be my favorite cast in a super massive game the quarry surpasses any of supermassive's latest game releases and reaches the

creepy cop vibes or dumb jock attitude with the sweet side this might be my favorite cast in a super massive game the quarry surpasses any of supermassive's latest game releases and reaches the heights that until dawn does it's a worthy campy horror successor the full review is on our youtube channel but for now you should know that
